phrase: What you suspected is true. Try to be kind to them, because this kindness will help improve everything.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: A beautiful dream will come true for you, and you will see how other dreams also become reality.
author: Japanese Proverb

phrase: The reality of the human being is their thoughts, not their material body.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: You will marry a professional athlete — if eating contests can be considered a sport.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: Brave is the one who loves.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: You don’t have to rush. What is meant for you will always arrive at the right moment.
author: Unknown

phrase: Your kindness will open doors you didn’t even know existed.
author: Chinese Proverb

phrase: Fortune favors those who dare to take the first step.
author: Latin Proverb

phrase: Soon you will receive good news that will change the direction of your week.
author: Unknown

phrase: The answer you are looking for will come when your mind is calm.
author: Buddhist Saying
